template.name: Template App Windows DNS Server
template.description: This template assesses the status and overall health of services and performance of a Microsoft DNS server.

item.name: Memory: Caching Memory
item.description: This component monitor returns the total amount of system memory in use by the DNS Server service for caching. Monitor this counter to determine whether cache use is optimizing the use of available memory

item.name: Memory: Database Node Memory
item.description: This component monitor returns the total amount of system memory in use by the DNS Server service for database nodes.

item.name: Dynamic Update: NoOperation/sec
item.description: This component monitor returns the average number of No-operation/Empty dynamic update requests received by the DNS server per second.

item.name: Dynamic Update: Received
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of dynamic update requests received by the DNS server. Monitor this counter after enabling dynamic updates to determine whether DNS clients are attempting to update their DNS addresses.

item.name: Dynamic Update: Rejected
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of dynamic updates rejected by the DNS server. Monitor this counter and compare this value against Dynamic Update: Received to determine how many systems are experiencing problems updating DNS addresses.

item.name: Dynamic Update: TimeOuts
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of dynamic update time-outs of the DNS server.

item.name: Dynamic Update: Written to Database
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of dynamic updates written to the database by the DNS server. Monitor this counter and compare this value against Dynamic Update: Received to determine how many systems are successfully updating DNS records.

item.name: Memory: Nbstat Memory
item.description: This component monitor returns the total amount of system memory in use by the DNS Server service for Nbtstat.

item.name: Memory: Record Flow Memory
item.description: This component monitor returns the total amount of system memory in use by the DNS Server service for record flow.

item.name: Recursive: Queries/sec
item.description: This component monitor returns the average number of recursive queries received by the DNS server per second.

item.name: Recursive: Query Failure/sec
item.description: This component monitor returns the average number of recursive query failures per second.

item.name: Recursive: TimeOut/sec
item.description: This component monitor returns the average number of recursive query sending time-outs per second.

item.name: Secure Update: Failure
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of secure updates that failed on the DNS server. Monitor this counter to determine whether or not clients can perform secure dynamic updates. Also, compare this value against Secure Update: Received to determine how many systems fail to perform secure updates in DNS.

item.name: Secure Update: Received
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of secure update requests received by the DNS server. Monitor this counter and compare this value against Secure Update: Failure to determine how many systems are successfully performing secure updates in DNS.

item.name: TCP: Message Memory
item.description: This component monitor returns the total amount of TCP message memory used by the DNS server.

item.name: TCP: Query Received/sec
item.description: This component monitor returns the average number of TCP queries received by the DNS server per second.

item.name: TCP: Response Sent/sec
item.description: This component monitor returns the average number of TCP responses sent by the DNS server per second.

item.name: Total Query Received/sec
item.description: This component monitor returns the average number of queries received by the DNS server per second. Monitor this counter to create baselines of server usage in heavily trafficked networks.

item.name: Total Response Sent/sec
item.description: This component monitor returns the average number of responses sent by the DNS server per second. Monitor this counter to create baselines of server usage in heavily trafficked networks.

item.name: UDP: Message Memory
item.description: This component monitor returns the total amount of UDP message memory used by the DNS server.

item.name: UDP: Query Received/sec
item.description: This component monitor returns the average number of UDP queries received by the DNS server per second.

item.name: UDP: Response Sent/sec
item.description: This component monitor returns the average number of UDP responses sent by the DNS server per second.

item.name: Zone Transfer: Failure
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of failed zone transfers of the master DNS server. Monitor this counter to troubleshoot name resolution failures.

item.name: Zone Transfer: Success
item.description: This component monitor returns the total number of successful zone transfers of the master DNS server. Monitor this counter to troubleshoot name resolution failures.

item.name: Service: DNS Server
item.description: This component monitor enables DNS clients to resolve DNS names by answering DNS queries and dynamic DNS update requests. If this service is stopped or disabled, DNS updates will not occur and any services that explicitly depend on it will fail to start.

trigger.expression: {Template App Windows DNS Server:service.info["DNS Server", state].last()}<>0
trigger.name: DNS Server service stopped
